subsection.name: Support for encrytped configuration files
subsection.p: Encryption/decryption of role and component configuration file using BlowfishJ from Markus Hahn (see http://www.lassekolb.info/bfacs.htm).

subsection.name: Adding a component personality
subsection.p: Based on the component personality a proper Context will be created (e.g. 'merlin', 'fortress', 'phoenix') and passed to the component. This would allow to reuse Avalon service written for other containers (I'm not jokink)

subsection.name: Adding a container personality
subsection.p: This would allow to embed YAAFI cleanly in another Avalon Container, e.g. within James.

subsection.name: Add automatic reconfiguration
subsection.p: It would be nice to poll the configuration files and trigger a reconfiguration if they were changed
